Text: I've been getting questions on when to jump in for long term buys. In 2008, $MSFT, $AMZN, both down 60%.  $SBUX was down 80%. Using that measure, long term buy levels are: $MSFT $77, $AMZN $875, $SBUX $20.  I would use 60% for tech, 80% for service. $MSFT my 1st choice.
